about_the_game: Drive the EMD SD70M Demonstrator unit 7013. With the introduction of the SD70M locomotive, the first three of the type were used by EMD as 'demonstrator' units, which they sent to various railroads for them to trial the new SD70M locomotives.
detailed_description: Drive the EMD SD70M Demonstrator unit 7013. With the introduction of the SD70M locomotive, the first three of the type were used by EMD as 'demonstrator' units, which they sent to various railroads for them to trial the new SD70M locomotives.
legal_notice: Published and developed by N3V Games Pty Ltd . N3V Games, Trainz and their respective logos are trademarks of N3V Games.  All other trademarks, logos and copyrights are property of their respective owners. All rights reserved.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 11.6
  • Processor: Intel i5 2Ghz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon Pro 555 with 1GB VRAM supporting OpenGL 3.3
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

name: Trainz Plus DLC - EMD SD70M Demonstrator 2

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 64bit
  • Processor: Intel i5 3GHz 64Bit Processor
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GT 430 or better/ AMD ATI 5550 or better
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes

short_description: Drive the EMD SD70M Demonstrator unit 7013. With the introduction of the SD70M locomotive, the first three of the type were used by EMD as 'demonstrator' units, which they sent to various railroads for them to trial the new SD70M locomotives.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Czech, Dutch, Polish, Russian
